topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981â€“1988, Volume XXXVIII, International Economic Development; International Debt; Foreign Assistance
topic.body: This volume documents the foreign policy decision making of the administration of President Ronald Reagan. It focuses on a global and thematic approach to U.S. foreign economic policies toward the developing world from 1981 until 1988.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981-1988, Volume XXXVIII, International Economic Development; International Debt; Foreign Assistance
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
